meanings.sent1: The unrazed building stood strong after the storm.
meanings.sent2: The unrazed house remained intact despite the earthquake.
meanings.sent3: The unrazed castle seemed to mock the wrecking ball.
meanings.sent4: Her unrazed spirit withstood all the challenges thrown her way.
meanings.sent5: The unrazed fortress was a symbol of resilience and strength.

meanings.sent1: The unrazed hill provided a scenic view of the valley.
meanings.sent2: The unrazed road had some bumps but was still passable.
meanings.sent3: The unrazed garden looked like a miniature jungle to the kids.
meanings.sent4: His unrazed determination kept him going despite the obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The unrazed path led us through the untouched wilderness.
